nrqlQueries.query: FROM Gigamon   SELECT count(*) FACET app_name WHERE app_name IS NOT NULL AND app_name != 'Classification-unknown' SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon  SELECT count(*) FACET app_name WHERE app_name = 'http' OR app_name = 'https' SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET app_name TIMESERIES SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET app_name,src_ip WHERE app_name LIKE '%ethereum%' OR app_name LIKE '%tcoin%' OR app_name LIKE 'monero' OR app_name LIKE '%miner%' SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT  app_name,src_ip,dst_ip WHERE app_name LIKE '%tcoin%' OR app_name LIKE 'monero' OR app_name LIKE '%miner%' OR app_name LIKE '%ether%'SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET app_name WHERE app_name LIKE '%torren%' OR app_name LIKE '%gnu%' OR app_name LIKE '%edonk%' OR app_name LIKE 'slsk' SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT  app_name,src_ip,dst_ip WHERE app_name LIKE '%torrent%' OR app_name LIKE '%mano%' OR app_name LIKE '%gnu%' OR app_name LIKE '%slsk%' OR app_name LIKE 'edonkey' SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET bittorrent_user_agent as 'P2P client' SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET bittorrent_client_version as 'Client Version' SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT src_ip,dst_ip,ip_wrong_crc where ip_wrong_crc IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT app_name,src_ip,dst_ip,tcp_wrong_crc  WHERE tcp_wrong_crc IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET src_ip,dst_ip,app_name,tcp_loss_count where tcp_loss_count IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET src_ip,dst_ip,app_name where tcp_flag_reset = 1 SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET ip_version SINCE 30 DAYS AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET ingress_vlan_id SINCE 30 DAYS AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon3 FACET dhcp_message_type SINCE 240 DAYS AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon3 FACET dhcp_siaddr SINCE 180 DAYS AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET src_ip,dst_ip,udp_wrong_crc WHERE udp_wrong_crc IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 days ago TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET dhcp_ciaddr SINCE 1656658800000 UNTIL 1662448440000 TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET dhcp_host_name SINCE 30 MINUTES AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT app_name,src_ip,dst_ip,tcp_rtt  WHERE tcp_rtt IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT app_name,src_ip,dst_ip,tcp_rtt_app WHERE tcp_rtt_app IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO

widgets.title: DNS sessions with slow response times

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Gigamon SELECT src_ip,dst_ip,dns_response_time,dns_name,dns_host_addr   where dns_response_time IS NOT NULL AND dns_response_time > '0.12' AND src_ip IS NOT NULL AND dst_ip IS NOT NULL SINCE 60 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET youtube_video_avgdatarate WHERE youtube_video_avgdatarate IN (500, '500') SINCE 30 DAYS AGO TIMESERIES
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET src_ip,http_server,http_rtt  where http_rtt IS NOT NULL AND http_rtt > '5' SINCE 30 days ago

widgets.title: DHCP Clients with ip lease times

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET dhcp_ip_lease_time, src_ip where dhcp_ip_lease_time IS NOT NULL  SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET ssl_cipher_suite_id_string,src,dst SINCE 60 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET ssl_cipher_suite_id_string SINCE 200 DAYS AGO

SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon3 FACET ssl_issuer as CA,ssl_validity_not_after as 'Expiration',ssl_common_name as 'common name',ssl_organization_name as 'Organization Name' where ssl_validity_not_after is not NULL SINCE 300 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT app_name,src_ip,dst_ip,src_mac,dst_mac WHERE app_name LIKE 'mqtt' OR app_name LIKE '%iec%' OR app_name LIKE '%coap%' SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon   SELECT count(*) FACET app_name,src_ip,dst_ip,dst_port,src_port WHERE app_name= 'ssh' AND src_ip= '10.0.5.8' AND dst_port='443' SINCE  60 days ago
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET src_ip, src_port,dst_ip,dst_port WHERE app_name = 'rdp' OR app_name = '%box%' OR app_name = '%smb%' OR app_name = '%ftp%' OR app_name = '%nfs%' SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET rdp_default_username, src_ip, src_port,dst_ip,dst_port WHERE app_name = 'rdp' and rdp_default_username IS NOT NULL SINCE 90 days ago
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET krb5_cname_string SINCE 30 DAYS AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET youtube_query_raw SINCE 30 DAYS AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET ftp_login SINCE 60 DAYS AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET smb_login SINCE 1656658800000 UNTIL 1662448440000 TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET src_ip, dst_ip, http_proxied_traffic where http_proxied_traffic IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET smtp_date, smtp_subject, src_ip, dst_ip, smtp_sender, smtp_receiver, smtp_client_domain  where smtp_subject IS NOT NULL SINCE 60 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET smb_path SINCE 1656658800000 UNTIL 1662448440000 TIMESERIES

FROM Gigamon SELECT  src_ip as 'DNS client',dst_ip as 'DNS Server', dns_name as 'query', dns_host_addr as 'DNS response' WHERE dns_host_addr IS NOT NULL AND dns_query IS NOT NULL AND src_ip IS NOT NULL AND dst_ip IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO

widgets.title: DNS Tunneling (indicates that the DNS traffic is likely to be diverted to transmit data of an other protocol)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET src_ip, dst_ip, dns_tunneling where dns_tunneling IS NOT NULL SINCE 60 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET dns_query SINCE 30 DAYS AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET dns_response_time SINCE 30 DAYS AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET src_ip,dst_ip,dns_ttl WHERE dns_ttl IS NOT NULL AND src_ip IS NOT NULL AND dst_ip IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
Select count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET dhcp_dns_server SINCE 30 DAYS AGO TIMESERIES
FROM Gigamon  SELECT count(*) FACET http_code WHERE http_code IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon where http_filename NOT LIKE '%Gigamon%' FACET http_filename,src_ip where http_filename is NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET http_method where http_method not like '%Gigamon%' SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET http_user_agent where http_user_agent IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET http_server_agent where http_server_agent IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET http_referer,http_host where http_referer is NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET http_version where http_version not like '%Gigamon%' and http_version='1.1' or http_version='1.0' SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET app_name,http_uri,http_server where http_uri is NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET http_code TIMESERIES where http_code is NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET http_request_size,http_rtt,http_server where http_rtt is not NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET http_accept_encoding SINCE 60 DAYS AGO TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Gigamon FACET http_filename SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET smb_filename,smb_path,src_ip WHERE app_name = 'smb' WHERE smb_path IS NOT NULL since 30 days ago
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET smb_version WHERE app_name = 'smb' WHERE smb_version IS NOT NULL since 30 days ago
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET src_ip,dst_ip,smb_version  WHERE app_name = 'smb' WHERE smb_version='1' since 30 days ago
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET  bgp_as  WHERE bgp_as IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET  bgp_hold_time,bgp_identifier  WHERE bgp_hold_time IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET  bgp_nlri_prefix,bgp_nlri_prefix_len,bgp_identifier  WHERE bgp_nlri_prefix IS NOT NULL SINCE 30 DAYS AGO
Select count(*) from Gigamon FACET bgp_path_attr_type,bgp_identifier where bgp_path_attr_type IS NOT NULL SINCE 90 days ago
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET  bgp_message_type,bgp_identifier SINCE 90 DAYS AGO
FROM Gigamon SELECT count(*) FACET  bgp_error_subcode, bgp_identifier where bgp_error_subcode IS NOT NULL SINCE 90 DAYS AGO
